short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a usability test, send it to testers, collect and visualize their feedback to improve your website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin allows you to create usability tests to improve your website. 
You can create a usability test with this plugin, download it and send it to potential testers.
Select ‘Take Test’ to carry out the test. Afterwards testers have the possibility to send you back the test result. This plugin also lets you visualize all the result files to figure out where you can improve your web application. 

The biggest advantages are the flexibility of testing any page you want and the ease of getting feedback from multiple testers in a matter of minutes. 

Go to leoleo.at/usabilityTest/index.html if you want to create a test or visualize the results in a bigger window. 
For questions or enquires contact me at leonhardleopold@gmail.com!
